alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 2:34PM EST until January 07 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THURSDAY TO 9 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 7 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Preston, Eastern Tucker and Western Tucker Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM Thursday to 9 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes.
info.instruction: If travel is absolutely necessary, drive with extreme caution. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Western Tucker
